other_tests.findings: Minor atelectasis at each lung base. Common hepatic duct measures 6 mm, common bile duct up to 7 mm. Extrahepatic biliary ducts up to 12 mm on recent ultrasound. Pancreatic duct measures 3 mm, no filling defects found in biliary ducts. Gallbladder shows marked wall thickening and intramural edema, trace free fluid adjacent to gallbladder. Decreased liver signal suggests iron overload. Small cyst in the pancreatic head suggests intraductal mucinous neoplasm. Multifocal scarring and thinning of the left kidney with several simple cysts. No lymphadenopathy or focal liver lesions.
